amendment.description: To require that amounts appropriated to the Department of Veterans Affairs for medical supplies and equipment are used to procure gender appropriate prosthetics.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2781 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2781 proposed by Senator Tester for Senator Blumenthal to Amendment SA 2763. (consideration: CR S7878-7881; text: CR S7879) To require that amounts appropriated to the Department of Veterans Affairs for medical supplies and equipment are used to procure gender appropriate prosthetics.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2781 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2781 proposed by Senator Tester for Senator Blumenthal to Amendment SA 2763.
